name: Custom Software by Preston
overview:
For over a decade, we have been helping businesses create the web development solutions that streamline business processes and achieve unparalleled efficiencies through technology. With expertise in software development technologies available and experience in a multitude of industries - we can offer professional development services targeted specifically for your requirements, budget, and timeframe.

  • Each member of our development team has 10 years of experience and is connected to group from previous projects.
  • Team based approach to projects where multiple people are familiar with specifics and can perform tasks.
  • Project Manager involvement (optionally) to ensure larger objectives are being met and absolutely satisfaction is achieved.
  • Continuous communication via Phone, IM, Email and Desktop Sharing.
  • Estimation of hours and delivery date (adjustable) for a given task with regular status meetings.
  • Top Notch Skills, Dedication, and Passion for the art of software development.
  • Flexibility to utilize clients approach and team members in most appropriate manner possible.
